title: 1.15.2挖矿与砍杀整合崩溃
txt_content:
Exception in thread "main" joptsimple.MultipleArgumentsForOptionException: Found multiple arguments for option gameDir, but you asked for only one
        at joptsimple.OptionSet.valueOf(OptionSet.java:179)
        at cpw.mods.modlauncher.ArgumentHandler.setArgs(ArgumentHandler.java:47)
        at cpw.mods.modlauncher.Launcher.run(Launcher.java:73)
        at cpw.mods.modlauncher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:65)

replies.author: 喵
replies.txt_content:
上传报错文件看看
在.minecraft/crash-reports
中

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
尝试重新安装整合（步骤为：HMCL安装纯净1.15.2 -> 手动下载安装最新版Forge）

嫌麻烦的话尝试使用现有整合：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
